cities.name: Baku

spring.description: Mild temperatures and blooming parks make sightseeing ideal.

ideas.name: Seaside Walks

ideas.name: Beach Trips

ideas.name: Night Caf√©s

public_transport_tips.tip: The Baku Metro is clean, affordable, and useful for longer distances.

cities.name: Ganja

spring.description: Parks and gardens turn green with mild temperatures.

public_transport_tips.tip: Marshrutkas and taxis are the most common ways to get around the city.
